name: Lode
description:
Solve puzzles by manipulating gravity and make your way deeper. Can you reach the bottom and find a way to escape?

-Features

Explore by using the strange technology scattered throughout the world to change the way gravity affects you and your surroundings.

Traverse every surface within reach, or use the room's gravity to move objects around.

64 x 64 pixel resolution and original chip tune sounds and music.

-Controls and supported input devices-

Controls:

Keyboard Controller Xbox PS Nintendo Move WASD, Arrows D-pad/L-stickD-pad/L-stick D-pad/L-stick View Mode (hold)Shift/IL bumper/YL1/TriangleL/XInteract Space/K A Cross B RestartBackspace/L B Circle Y LiftEnter/J X Square Y

A game by

James and Michael 

Trujillo

Lode is a submission to the LOWREZ Jam 2022 and was made in 14 days!
